summary: This is an FBI interview summary (302 form) documenting an attempted interview with inmate Steven Hoffenberg at Fort Dix Federal Correctional Institution on October 12, 2010. Hoffenberg refused to answer questions about Jeffrey Epstein or the murder of Arthur L. Shapiro without a court-appointed attorney present, but indicated willingness to cooperate if one was provided.

keyFacts: Steven Hoffenberg, an inmate at Fort Dix Federal Correctional Institution, was interviewed by FBI agents on October 12, 2010.
Hoffenberg refused to answer questions about Jeffrey Epstein or the murder of Arthur L. Shapiro without a court-appointed attorney present.
Hoffenberg indicated he would be willing to cooperate and answer questions once a court-appointed attorney was provided.
Hoffenberg referred agents to a March 2003 Vanity Fair article and a website, TowerInvestors.com, for information.
Hoffenberg had pending civil matters against the Bureau of Prisons at the time of the interview.
